Sentencas: Incomplete oxidation on the anode side of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) leaves a considerable amount of unused fuel (e.g., H-2 and CO) in the anode exhaust.
Titulo: Membrane processes for CO2 removal and fuel utilization enhancement for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In order to enhance fuel utilization, CO2-selective membranes can be employed to remove the CO2 in the anode exhaust before returning the recovered fuel to the SOFC.
Titulo: Membrane processes for CO2 removal and fuel utilization enhancement for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this study, two membrane processes have been designed for integration with a SOFC system, one with an air sweep (SOFC-MBair) and the other with a vacuum (SOFC-MBvac), on the permeate side.
Titulo: Membrane processes for CO2 removal and fuel utilization enhancement for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The transport properties of developed membranes were applied to the processes, and techno-economic analysis (TEA) was carried out to estimate the CO2 removal cost of each process.
Titulo: Membrane processes for CO2 removal and fuel utilization enhancement for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The parameters investigated were the anode exhaust recycle percentage, stack fuel utilization of the SOFC, power output, as well as the area and transport properties of the membranes.
Titulo: Membrane processes for CO2 removal and fuel utilization enhancement for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Notably, at 100% anode exhaust recycle, the system fuel utilization can be boosted to >99% for both processes.
Titulo: Membrane processes for CO2 removal and fuel utilization enhancement for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: By tuning the stack fuel utilization, a steam-to-carbon ratio above 1.5 is achievable.
Titulo: Membrane processes for CO2 removal and fuel utilization enhancement for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It was found that the SOFCMBvac process can achieve a lower CO2 removal cost than the SOFC-MBair process.
Titulo: Membrane processes for CO2 removal and fuel utilization enhancement for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: For the SOFC-MBvac process, by considering the value of the recovered fuel, the CO2 removal cost not only can be fully rebated by the recovered fuel value, but also there is a profit of about $38 per tonne of CO2 captured.
Titulo: Membrane processes for CO2 removal and fuel utilization enhancement for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Moreover, by taking into account a CO2 sale price of $40/tonne for enhanced oil recovery, a profit of about $66 per tonne of CO2 captured may be achieved.
Titulo: Membrane processes for CO2 removal and fuel utilization enhancement for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, more cost reduction or profit is attainable by developing membranes with higher CO2 permeances.
Titulo: Membrane processes for CO2 removal and fuel utilization enhancement for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, a zero-carbon electricity generation can be achieved by the SOFC-MBvac process.
Titulo: Membrane processes for CO2 removal and fuel utilization enhancement for solid oxide fuel cells
